title: Marshmallow Crispy Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
What happens when two desserts get turned into one?

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] [Applause] [Music] what's up everybody I'm Greg and welcome to Oreo oration now while you watching the Grammys and trying to act tougher on your friends saying I don't know that Justin timberli what about him but singing the songs in your head the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear up in a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video subscribe to our Channel and share it with your friends today we're reviewing marshmallow Crispies Oreos these are limited edition I have seen the thousands of tweets youve sent me I'm glad that all of a sudden ABC and Esquire and all these other dumb people on the internet want to start stealing my dumb show but anyways I've seen them we're here to review them the idea you have of course the golden cake Oreos that we know well you know this the the the shortbread cookie I've reviewed so many times in the oration mixed with
